thread.title: Ranveers Funny Message For Alia Is In Sync With Our Excitement To Watch Them Together
thread.title_full: Ranveers Funny Message For Alia Is In Sync With Our Excitement To Watch Them Together

author: MensXP Team
title: Ranveers Funny Message For Alia Is In Sync With Our Excitement To Watch Them Together
text:
Gossip By MensXP Team , Thursday, 09 Feb 2017 
Ranveer and Alia are set to come together on the silver screen for a movie and the news has already left us hanging in excitement. — Excel Entertainment (@excelmovies) February 8, 2017 
Alia is currently gearing up for ‘Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya’, whereas Ranveer is shooting for ‘Padmavati’. However, their team already looks like a laugh riot and since they both are amazing actors, we cannot help but already perceive the amount of buzz they will create. They have already won hearts with their advertisement series for a travel portal they both endorse. © Twitter 
Ranveer shared a funny clip on his Twitter, exclaiming how he is looking ‘faarward’ to work with Alia. — Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) February 8, 2017 
This is exactly why we are looking forward to see them weave magic together. 
Photo: © Facebook (Main Image)
